item.title: Youtube channel set up and editing professional zoom interviews for my channel. - Upwork
item.description:
Need consultation, coaching and support in starting a youtube channel where my goal is to present professional looking zoom video interviews with other therapists.  Would also need help with branding and marketing. Will need a bit of handholding until I can get it off the ground so tips, ideas and unsolicited advice is welcome!


Hourly Range: $25.00-$50.00

item.title: Advanced Instagram Reel Ad Video Editor - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I'm looking for a highly experienced and skilled Video Editor, to help edit 7x 1-2 minute Instagram Reels.

The raw footage is filmed in a podcast style conversation. And I need your help to edit the videos, add captions and graphics, and overlay footage to make them highly engaging so I can run them as paid ads to generate leads.

The successful applicant will be given many ongoing contracts of work as we own a large digital advertising agency with many clients.

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 22, 2024 03:01 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Video Production
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Content Creator for Brand - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled content creator to organize and transform 2 years of raw content into visually appealing and engaging posts and videos for an individual's public profile. This individual's content will revolve around themes such as masculinity, work, health, elegance, travel, firearms, reading, and the finer things in life. The successful candidate will sift through all content and curate it to create a cohesive and aesthetic brand image that reflects these themes.

The ideal candidate should have experience in content creation, video editing, and social media management, with a knack for storytelling and a creative eye. Attention to detail and strong organizational skills are essential. Initially, the role will focus on crafting the individual's public profile content. If successful, the position will evolve to include creating content for the company’s broader brand. If you can bring this distinctive vision to life through compelling visuals, we want to hear from you!

Budget: $1,000
Posted On: June 22, 2024 02:58 UTC
Category: Brand Identity Design
Skills:Content Writing, Creative Writing, Copywriting, Branding, Content Creation, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Content Development, Content Editing
Skills: Content Writing, Creative Writing, Copywriting, Branding, Content Creation, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Content Development, Content Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Produce a 15 minute YouTube video - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone to create and edit a YouTube video for me. The topic is genealogy. I have voice recorder 15 minutes of dialogue and have a dozen pictures. I have no video footage so using stock pictures and videos plus a few of my photos, the job is to produce an engaging 15 minute YouTube video that fits perfectly with my narration. I imagine the video will pictures and videos relating to topics around genealogy, some historical events, fly overs of a few countries and cities etc. Over my narration some low level music will be appropriate. The key is to make sure my voice can be heard clearly.

Budget: $250
Posted On: June 22, 2024 02:47 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Biography, Narrated Presentation
Skills: Biography, Narrated Presentation
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Instagram Reels Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented individual to create Instagram Reels from our long form podcast. The goal is to produce engaging videos in the same styles as the ones on our ZenGame Instagram account (instagram.com/zengamepod). The ideal candidate should have experience in video editing and a keen eye for visual storytelling. This project requires creativity, attention to detail, and the ability to work independently. If you have a passion for social media and can bring our podcast content to life in short, captivating videos, we want to hear from you. Join our team and help us expand our reach on Instagram!

Hourly Range: $8.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 02:51 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Graphic Design
Skills: Instagram, Social Media Marketing, Social Media Management, Graphic Design
Country: United States

item.title: Thumbnail Designer For YouTube Channel (Long Term $5 per design) - Upwork
item.description:
I'm looking for someone creative that can come up with a design out of the box, I have worked with other thumbnail designers in the past most just copy and paste the title into the background. I'm open to AI images, as long as there is editing. I'm looking for someone I can work long term with, I have a team and just started this new Channel in the (Christian Bible Stories) Niche. I'm producing videos every week, need someone to deliver on time.

- Down Below are also the guidelines, of thumbnails that have a higher % CTR that I would like you to follow. My primary text color is White, Secondary if needed is Golden.

(Test) - If you're Interested, design a thumbnail for a video called  "WHAT WAS THE WORLD LIKE BEFORE CREATION"   / You can place a watemark on top, it will be used to compare and to see if you can create what I'm looking for, compared to other freelancers.

If you manage to deliver what I want, I will be looking forward to working with you!


Budget: $5
Posted On: June 22, 2024 02:47 UTC
Category: Image Editing
Skills:AI Image Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Adobe Illustrator, Social Media Imagery, Photo Editing, Illustration, YouTube Thumbnail, Thumbnail, YouTube, Logo Design
Skills: AI Image Editing, Adobe Photoshop, Graphic Design, Adobe Illustrator, Social Media Imagery, Photo Editing, Illustration, YouTube Thumbnail, Thumbnail, YouTube, Logo Design
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Intro sound effects and music - Upwork
item.description:
I have a custom visual intro video that is 25 seconds long. Cinematic / Sci-fi  in nature.   I am looking for multiple Pro contractors to create their own masterpiece based on the details I provide once we chat!

Each contractor will create their own version. There will multiple versions (from other contractors) and the best one created will be the final intro!

The deadline is July 1st.

If you are interested, please let me know! I currently have 1 contractor working on their version so length of time and requested price will play a huge factor in determining who I contact.

Thank you!

- Trinity


Posted On: June 22, 2024 02:32 UTC
Category: Audio Production
Skills:Audio Effects, Sound Mixing, Music & Sound Design, Audio Production, Audio Editing, Music Production
Skills: Audio Effects, Sound Mixing, Music & Sound Design, Audio Production, Audio Editing, Music Production
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
